attributes.action: something really needs to be done about this
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Midwifery Today, the mother and baby alert service today highlights the stories of "Survivor Moms: Women's Stories of Birthing, Mothering and Healing after Sexual Abuse", written to help break down the isolation pregnant women and their caregivers often feel - as though they were the only ones having to cope with these challenges. Something really needs to be done about this, P.M. to ensure truly sensitive midwifery and care with confidence.

rejection.details: Please replace the main sentence with a clear action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
